forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 70. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8am and noon. Partly sunny, with a high near 94. Heat index values as high as 99. West wind 12 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As midnight cloaks Boston in its still embrace, the air is warm and inviting, holding a low temperature around 70. The night sky, draped in a veil of clouds, whispers promises of a vibrant dawn. A gentle southwesterly breeze rustles through the trees, hinting at the balmy revelry that the day will bring. As morning unfurls, expect a flirtation with thunderstorms, though only a slight chance at first light. The sun will soon shy away, giving way to a tapestry of partly sunny skies that will beckon you outdoors.

By midday, temperatures will climb toward a sweltering 94, with the heat index pushing the day into the realms of discomfort. It will feel heavy, as though the air itself is a warm embrace. In such weather, dressing lightly becomes a necessity; cottons and loose fabrics will shield you against the rising warmth, while a hint of a breeze may offer fleeting respite. Consider venturing into the shade of local parks or indulging in a casual stroll along the Esplanade, where the sounds of whispers and laughter mingle with the rustle of leaves. As the day progresses, don’t forget to stay hydrated, perhaps savoring a cool iced beverage from a nearby café. Whether it be engaging in quiet moments of reflection or enjoying the company of friends, this summer day promises to unfold with its own sense of casual charm.
